Slimebound:ProtectTheBoss.NAME: Protect the Boss
Slimebound:ProtectTheBoss.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next time you would be damaged by an enemy attack, slimeboundmod:Absorbing your leading Slime instead.
Slimebound:ProtectTheBoss.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next 2 times you would be damaged by an enemy attack, slimeboundmod:Absorbing your leading Slime instead.

Slimebound:SamplingLick.NAME: Sampling Lick
Slimebound:SamplingLick.DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:SamplingLick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Replication.NAME: Replication
Slimebound:Replication.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. NL Put a copy of that card on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:Replication.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. NL Add a copy of it into your hand. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: to add a copy into your hand.
to put a copy on top of your draw pile.

Slimebound:Overexert.NAME: Overexert
Slimebound:Overexert.DESCRIPTION: Gain 4 slimeboundmod:Potency. NL !M! turns from now, slimeboundmod:Absorb all Slimes.
Slimebound:Overexert.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 4 slimeboundmod:Potency. NL slimeboundmod:Command twice. NL !M! turns from now, slimeboundmod:Absorb all Slimes.

Slimebound:Split.NAME: Split
Slimebound:Split.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 4 Slimes to slimeboundmod:Split into. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:Split.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 2 of 4 Slimes to slimeboundmod:Split into. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:LeadByExample.NAME: Lead By Example
Slimebound:LeadByExample.DESCRIPTION: The first card you play each turn that targets enemies also slimeboundmod:Commands.
Slimebound:LeadByExample.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first !M! cards you play each turn that targets enemies also slimeboundmod:Commands.

Slimebound:SlimeTap.NAME: Slime Tap
Slimebound:SlimeTap.DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Absorb - Gain [E] [E] and draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:SlimeTap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Absorb Twice - Gain [E] [E] and draw 2 cards for each slimeboundmod:Absorbed. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Teamwork.NAME: Teamwork
Slimebound:Teamwork.DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Command X times. NL Gain !B! Block X times.
Slimebound:Teamwork.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Command X+1 times. NL Gain !B! Block X+1 times.

Slimebound:SlimeBarrage.NAME: Pile On!
Slimebound:SlimeBarrage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. slimeboundmod:Command ALL slimes twice.

Slimebound:SlimeBrawl.NAME: Slime Brawl
Slimebound:SlimeBrawl.DESCRIPTION: Play the top card of your draw pile. Repeat for each of your spawned Slimes. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SelfFormingGoo.NAME: Reformation
Slimebound:SelfFormingGoo.DESCRIPTION: When you slimeboundmod:Absorb a Slime, gain !M! Strength.
Slimebound:SelfFormingGoo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you slimeboundmod:Absorb a Slime, gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity.

Slimebound:OozeBath.NAME: Ooze Bath
Slimebound:OozeBath.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! slimeboundmod:Goop to target enemy at the start of each of its turns. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:OozeBath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Triple the enemy's slimeboundmod:Goop. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:LeechingTouch.NAME: Leeching Strike
Slimebound:LeechingTouch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL slimeboundmod:Consume - Gain Block equal to the enemy's slimeboundmod:Goop.

Slimebound:Dissolve.NAME: Dissolve
Slimebound:Dissolve.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card, then Exhaust a card in your hand. Add a number of *Licks to your hand equal to its cost. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:Dissolve.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card, then Exhaust a card in your hand. Add a number of *Licks to your hand equal to its cost plus 1. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:DuplicatedForm.NAME: Duplicated Form
Slimebound:DuplicatedForm.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP and !M! Max HP this combat. NL The first card you play each turn that targets enemies is played twice.
Slimebound:DuplicatedForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP and !M! Max HP this combat. NL Gain [E] each turn. NL The first card you play each turn that targets enemies is played twice.

Slimebound:Recollect.NAME: Recollect
Slimebound:Recollect.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Return a random 0-cost Exhausted card to your hand.
Slimebound:Recollect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Return 2 random 0-cost Exhausted cards to your hand.

Slimebound:GrowthPunch.NAME: Growth Punch
Slimebound:GrowthPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL slimeboundmod:Consume - Increase this card's effects by !M! this combat.

Slimebound:CheckThePlaybook.NAME: Consult Playbook
Slimebound:CheckThePlaybook.DESCRIPTION: Add 4 random slimeboundmod:Tackle cards to your hand. They cost 1 less this combat. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Recycling.NAME: Recycling
Slimebound:Recycling.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, return a random Exhausted 0-cost card to your hand.
Slimebound:Recycling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, return a random Exhausted 0-cost card to your hand.

Slimebound:Repurpose.NAME: Repurpose
Slimebound:Repurpose.DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Absorb - Split into a random slimeboundmod:Specialist Slime. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:Repurpose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Absorb - Split into a random slimeboundmod:Specialist Slime. NL slimeboundmod:Command. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:RollThrough.NAME: Roll Through
Slimebound:RollThrough.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL You do not take damage from the next !M! slimeboundmod:Tackle cards.

Slimebound:MassRepurpose.NAME: Mass Repurpose
Slimebound:MassRepurpose.DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Absorb ALL Slimes. NL Split into a random slimeboundmod:Specialist Slime for each slimeboundmod:Absorbed. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:MassRepurpose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Absorb ALL Slimes. NL Split into a random slimeboundmod:Specialist Slime for each slimeboundmod:Absorbed, then slimeboundmod:Command them all. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Lick.NAME: Lick
Slimebound:Lick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:HauntingLick.NAME: Haunting Lick
Slimebound:HauntingLick.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:HauntingLick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:MegaLick.NAME: Mega-Lick
Slimebound:MegaLick.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:MegaLick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop to ALL enemies. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:RejuvenatingLick.NAME: Double Lick
Slimebound:RejuvenatingLick.DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop. NL Add a *Lick to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:RejuvenatingLick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop. NL Add a *Lick to your hand. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Gluttony.NAME: Gluttony
Slimebound:Gluttony.DESCRIPTION: The first time you slimeboundmod:Consume each turn, add a *Lick to your hand.
Slimebound:Gluttony.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL The first time you slimeboundmod:Consume each turn, add a *Lick to your hand.

Slimebound:TongueLash.NAME: Tongue Lash
Slimebound:TongueLash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals !M! additional damage for each Exhausted card containing "Lick".

Slimebound:ItLooksTasty.NAME: It Looks Tasty
Slimebound:ItLooksTasty.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. slimeboundmod:Consume - Add a *Lick to your hand.
Slimebound:ItLooksTasty.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. slimeboundmod:Consume - Add a *Lick+ to your hand.

Slimebound:AcidTongue.NAME: Spreading Slime
Slimebound:AcidTongue.DESCRIPTION: Effects that apply slimeboundmod:Goop apply !M! more.

Slimebound:FirmFortitude.NAME: Liquidate
Slimebound:FirmFortitude.DESCRIPTION: Cannot be used if you have negative Strength. NL Lose 2 Strength. NL Gain !M! slimeboundmod:Potency.

Slimebound:WasteNot.NAME: Waste Not
Slimebound:WasteNot.DESCRIPTION: Return all 0-cost Exhausted cards to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Prepare.NAME: Prepare
Slimebound:Prepare.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain [E] [E] and draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:Prepare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain [E] [E] and draw !M! cards. NL Retain up to !M! cards this turn. Exhaust.

Slimebound:Grow.NAME: Grow
Slimebound:Grow.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Slime slot in exchange for !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity.

Slimebound:HungryTackle.NAME: Hungry Tackle
Slimebound:HungryTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. NL Return a random 0-cost Exhausted card to your hand.
Slimebound:HungryTackle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. NL Return 2 random 0-cost Exhausted cards to your hand.

Slimebound:FinishingTackle.NAME: Opening Tackle
Slimebound:FinishingTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. slimeboundmod:Consume - Apply !M! Vulnerable.

Slimebound:LivingWall.NAME: Living Wall
Slimebound:LivingWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop to attackers this turn.

Slimebound:ComboTackle.NAME: Spear Tackle
Slimebound:ComboTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. NL Draw !M! cards.

Slimebound:Tackle.NAME: Tackle
Slimebound:Tackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself.

Slimebound:GoopTackle.NAME: Combo Tackle
Slimebound:GoopTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. NL Add a random slimeboundmod:Tackle card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
Slimebound:GoopTackle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. NL Add a random Upgraded slimeboundmod:Tackle card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

Slimebound:Chomp.NAME: Chomp
Slimebound:Chomp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce the cost of a random slimeboundmod:Tackle card in your hand to 0 this turn.
Slimebound:Chomp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce the cost of a random slimeboundmod:Tackle card in your hand to 0 this combat.

Slimebound:DouseInSlime.NAME: Douse in Slime
Slimebound:DouseInSlime.DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop. NL The next Attack used on this enemy does not remove slimeboundmod:Goop.

Slimebound:FlameTackle.NAME: Flame Tackle
Slimebound:FlameTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. NL slimeboundmod:Tackles deal !M! more damage this combat.

Slimebound:RainOfGoop.NAME: Rain of Goop
Slimebound:RainOfGoop.DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop to a random enemy !M! times.
Slimebound:RainOfGoop.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop to a random enemy !M! times.

Slimebound:GoopSpray.NAME: Goop Spray
Slimebound:GoopSpray.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! slimeboundmod:Goop and !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

Slimebound:MassFeed.NAME: Mass Feed
Slimebound:MassFeed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If Fatal, raise your Max HP by !M!. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:ViciousTackle.NAME: Vicious Tackle
Slimebound:ViciousTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. This gains twice the damage bonus from slimeboundmod:Goop.
Slimebound:ViciousTackle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. This gains twice the damage bonus AND healing from slimeboundmod:Goop.

Slimebound:LeechEnergy.NAME: Leech Energy
Slimebound:LeechEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. slimeboundmod:Consume - Gain [E] and draw !M! card.
Slimebound:LeechEnergy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. slimeboundmod:Consume - Gain [E] and draw !M! cards.

Slimebound:LeechLife.NAME: Leech Life
Slimebound:LeechLife.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL slimeboundmod:Consume - Heal HP equal to the enemy's slimeboundmod:Goop. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Equalize.NAME: Equalize
Slimebound:Equalize.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Heal !M! HP. NL slimeboundmod:Consume - Play this twice. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:DisruptingSlam.NAME: Disrupting Slam
Slimebound:DisruptingSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Apply !M! Weak to each enemy that intends to attack.

Slimebound:PrepareCrush.NAME: Prepare: Crush
Slimebound:PrepareCrush.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain [E] [E] [E] and !M! Strength, and add Slime Crush to your hand.
Slimebound:PrepareCrush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain [E] [E] [E] [E] and !M! Strength, and add Slime Crush to your hand.

Slimebound:SlimeCrush.NAME: SLIME CRUSH!!!
Slimebound:SlimeCrush.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:DivideAndConquer.NAME: Divide & Conquer
Slimebound:DivideAndConquer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each Slime. NL slimeboundmod:Absorb all Slimes. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:ServeAndProtect.NAME: Serve & Protect
Slimebound:ServeAndProtect.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and 1 bronze:Blur for each Slime. NL slimeboundmod:Absorb all Slimes. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SplitBruiser.NAME: Split: Bruiser
Slimebound:SplitBruiser.DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Bruiser_Slime. NL slimeboundmod:Command !M! times. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:SplitBruiser.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Bruiser_Slime. NL slimeboundmod:Command three times. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SplitLeeching.NAME: Split: Leeching
Slimebound:SplitLeeching.DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Leeching_Slime. NL slimeboundmod:Command !M! times. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:SplitLeeching.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Leeching_Slime. NL slimeboundmod:Command three times. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SplitAcid.NAME: Split: Guerilla
Slimebound:SplitAcid.DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Guerilla_Slime. NL slimeboundmod:Command !M! times. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:SplitAcid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Guerilla_Slime. NL slimeboundmod:Command three times. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SplitMire.NAME: Split: Mire
Slimebound:SplitMire.DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Mire_Slime. NL slimeboundmod:Command !M! times. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:SplitMire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Mire_Slime. NL slimeboundmod:Command three times. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SplitSpecialist.NAME: Split: Specialist
Slimebound:SplitSpecialist.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 slimeboundmod:Specialist Slimes to slimeboundmod:Split into. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:SplitSpecialist.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 slimeboundmod:Specialist Slimes to slimeboundmod:Split into. NL slimeboundmod:Command. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:MinionMaster.NAME: Minion Master
Slimebound:MinionMaster.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card that triggers slimeboundmod:Command, slimeboundmod:Command again.
Slimebound:MinionMaster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a card that triggers slimeboundmod:Command, slimeboundmod:Command again.

Slimebound:BestDefense.NAME: Recklessness
Slimebound:BestDefense.DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Tackles deal !M! more damage to enemies, and 1 more damage to you.

Slimebound:Darklings.NAME: Darkling Trio
Slimebound:Darklings.DESCRIPTION: slimeboundmod:Split into a slimeboundmod:Darkling_Slime !M! times. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SlimeSlap.NAME: Slime Slap
Slimebound:SlimeSlap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL slimeboundmod:Consume - Does not remove slimeboundmod:Goop.

Slimebound:OneTwoCombo.NAME: One-Two Combo
Slimebound:OneTwoCombo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When you slimeboundmod:Split, return this from the discard pile to your hand.
Slimebound:OneTwoCombo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL slimeboundmod:Command. NL When you slimeboundmod:Split, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

Slimebound:ForwardTackle.NAME: Forward Tackle
Slimebound:ForwardTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. NL slimeboundmod:Command twice.
Slimebound:ForwardTackle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. NL slimeboundmod:Command three times.

Slimebound:TagTeam.NAME: Tag Team
Slimebound:TagTeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL slimeboundmod:Split into a random Slime. NL slimeboundmod:Command !M! times.
Slimebound:TagTeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL slimeboundmod:Split into a random slimeboundmod:Specialist Slime. NL slimeboundmod:Command !M! times.

Slimebound:RallyTheTroops.NAME: Rally the Troops
Slimebound:RallyTheTroops.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next !M! cards played this turn trigger a slimeboundmod:Command.

Slimebound:Nibble.NAME: Nibble
Slimebound:Nibble.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a random 0-cost card to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Slimebound:Nibble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a random Upgraded 0-cost card to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:Schlurp.NAME: Schlurp
Slimebound:Schlurp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Licks to your hand.

Slimebound:SplitGreed.NAME: Revive Greed
Slimebound:SplitGreed.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Summon Greed Ooze. NL Exhaust.

Slimebound:SplitScrap.NAME: Revive Scrap
Slimebound:SplitScrap.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Summon Scrap Ooze. NL Exhaust.
